name: C. Neko does Maths
statement:
Neko loves divisors. During the latest number theory lesson, he got an
interesting exercise from his math teacher.Neko has two integers a and
b. His goal is to find a non-negative integer k such that the least
common multiple of a+k and b+k is the smallest possible. If there are
multiple optimal integers k, he needs to choose the smallest one.Given
his mathematical talent, Neko had no trouble getting Wrong Answer on
this problem. Can you help him solve it?
